tiles.name: Derelict Assembly Line
tiles.description: A section of a factory, filled with concrete rubble and damaged machinery. Leaking pipes drip onto the metal flooring.  Energy conduits hum faintly nearby.

tiles.name: Collapsed Storage Unit
tiles.description: A dilapidated warehouse tile, now a pile of concrete rubble and twisted metal.  Exposed wiring sparks occasionally. A potential hidden entrance is concealed beneath debris.

tiles.name: Flooded Subway Section
tiles.description: Part of an underground transit tunnel, flooded with water from leaking pipes.  The air is damp and cool.  Makeshift barricades block part of the tunnel.

tiles.name: Energy Conduit Nexus
tiles.description: A section dominated by glowing energy conduits, built and maintained by the Lumin. The area is noticeably warmer.  Metal flooring shows signs of recent repair.

tiles.name: Overlook to Ruined Skyscraper
tiles.description: A vantage point offering a view of crumbling skyscrapers in the distance. Concrete rubble underfoot. A sense of desolate beauty permeates the area.

tiles.name: Hidden Workshop Entrance
tiles.description: A seemingly unremarkable section of factory wall, concealing a hidden entrance to a Lumin workshop.  Energy conduits run along the wall, subtly camouflaging the entrance.

tiles.name: Unstable Generator Room
tiles.description: A factory section containing damaged machinery. The temperature fluctuates wildly due to an unstable power source. Exposed wiring is everywhere.

tiles.name: Scrap Market
tiles.description: A makeshift settlement built amidst concrete rubble and abandoned vehicles. Jury-rigged solutions are everywhere.  The atmosphere is gritty and desperate.

tiles.name: Collapsed Loading Bay
tiles.description: A section of a warehouse with a collapsed loading bay. Leaking pipes create puddles on the metal flooring.  Technological decay is evident throughout.
